import React from 'react'; import {PopupContent} from "../components/PopupContent" import Popup from 'reactjs-popup'; interface CardProps { id:string, imageBuyer: string; buyer: string; seller: string; imageSeller: string; unitcost: string; xirr: string; totalunit:string; remainingunit:string; tenure: string; } export const CardComponent: React.FC = ({ id, imageBuyer, buyer, seller, imageSeller, unitcost, xirr, totalunit, remainingunit, tenure }) => { return (

Buyer

{buyer}

Seller

{seller}

Units cost

₹ {unitcost}

XIRR

{xirr}

Unit left

{remainingunit}/{totalunit}

Tenure

{tenure} Days

); };
